languages.text: {n}Рисунки невольников были слишком... системны. Они не могли быть абсурдной бессмыслицей — слишком одинаковы были повторяющиеся в них наборы точек и черт. Но если это был язык, то изобрел его, судя по сложности и невозможности расшифровки, явно не каторжник.{/n}

{n}The drawing of the prisoners have been... too systematic. They could not simply be gibberish — the sets of repeating elements of the dashes and dots are far too similar. But if it indeed was a secret language, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, the language was definitely not created by a convict.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рисунки невольников были слишком... системны. Они не могли быть абсурдной бессмыслицей — слишком одинаковы были повторяющиеся в них наборы точек и черт. Но если это был язык, то изобрел его, судя по сложности и невозможности расшифровки, явно не каторжник.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The drawing of the prisoners have been... too systematic. They could not simply be gibberish — the sets of the repeating elements of the dashes and dots are too similar. But if it indeed was a secret language, then, judging by the complexity and the impossibility of decoding, it definitely has not been created by a convict.{/n}

But if it indeed was a secret language, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, the language was definitely not created by a convict.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些囚犯的涂鸦……很有系统。这些符号不可能仅仅是简单的胡言乱语，因为划线和圆点的重复元素实在是过于相似。不过，如果它确实是某种暗号的话，就它的复杂性和无法破解的特性来看，这种语言肯定不是某个囚犯创造出来的。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing of the prisoners have been... too systematic. They could not simply be gibberish — the sets of repeating elements of the dashes and dots are far too similar. But if it indeed was a secret language, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, the language was definitely not created by a convict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些囚犯的涂鸦……很有系统。这些符号不可能仅仅是简单的胡言乱语，因为划线和圆点的重复元素实在是过于相似。不过，如果它确实是某种暗号的话，就它的复杂性和无法破解的特性来看，这种语言肯定不是某个囚犯创造出来的。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El dibujo de los prisioneros ha sido... demasiado sistemático. No podía tratarse simplemente de un galimatías: los conjuntos de elementos repetidos de los guiones y los puntos son demasiado similares. Pero si realmente se trataba de un lenguaje secreto, entonces, a juzgar por su complejidad y la imposibilidad de descifrarlo, el lenguaje definitivamente no fue creado por un convicto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing of the prisoners have been... too systematic. They could not simply be gibberish — the sets of repeating elements of the dashes and dots are far too similar. But if it indeed was a secret language, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, the language was definitely not created by a convict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El dibujo de los prisioneros ha sido... demasiado sistemático. No podía tratarse simplemente de un galimatías: los conjuntos de elementos repetidos de los guiones y los puntos son demasiado similares. Pero si realmente se trataba de un lenguaje secreto, entonces, a juzgar por su complejidad y la imposibilidad de descifrarlo, el lenguaje definitivamente no fue creado por un convicto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}囚人たちの絵はあまりにも...きちょうめんだった。単にわけが分からないというわけではない...線と点の繰り返し要素があまりにも類似している。しかし、もしそれが本当に秘密の言語だとすれば、その複雑さと解読の不可能さから判断して、その言語は間違いなく囚人が作り出したものではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing of the prisoners have been... too systematic. They could not simply be gibberish — the sets of repeating elements of the dashes and dots are far too similar. But if it indeed was a secret language, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, the language was definitely not created by a convict.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人たちの絵はあまりにも...きちょうめんだった。単にわけが分からないというわけではない...線と点の繰り返し要素があまりにも類似している。しかし、もしそれが本当に秘密の言語だとすれば、その複雑さと解読の不可能さから判断して、その言語は間違いなく囚人が作り出したものではない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les dessins des détenus sont... trop récurrents, il ne peut s'agir de simples gribouillages. Les ensembles d'éléments qui se répètent, les traits, les points... tout cela est trop similaire d'un dessin à l'autre. Si c'est effectivement un langage secret, alors d'après sa complexité et l'impossibilité de le déchiffrer, il n'a pas été créé par un esclave.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The drawing of the prisoners have been... too systematic. They could not simply be gibberish — the sets of repeating elements of the dashes and dots are far too similar. But if it indeed was a secret language, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, the language was definitely not created by a convict.{/n}

Les ensembles d'éléments qui se répètent, les traits, les points... tout cela est trop similaire d'un dessin à l'autre. Si c'est effectivement un langage secret, alors d'après sa complexité et l'impossibilité de le déchiffrer, il n'a pas été créé par un esclave.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Zeichnungen der Gefangenen waren zu ... systematisch. Sie konnten nicht einfach wirres Zeug sein. Die sich wiederholenden Elemente der Linien und Punkte waren sich einfach zu ähnlich. Wenn es aber tatsächlich eine Geheimsprache war, dann war sie ob ihrer Komplexität und der Unmöglichkeit, sie zu entschlüsseln, gewiss nicht von einem Sträfling entwickelt worden.{/n}

But if it indeed was a secret language, then, judging by its complexity and the impossibility of decoding it, the language was definitely not created by a convict.{/n}
